Each seedling is placed during optimal soil moisture windows and supported with a proprietary organic basal nutrient application to promote rapid establishment, early resilience, and healthy long-term development."}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"relative h-[400px]","children":["$","$L5",null,{"src":"/images/test.jpeg","alt":"Planting plan","fill":true,"className":"object-cover rounded-lg"}]}]]}]}]}]]}],["$","$L6",null,{"children":"$L7"}],null,["$","$L8",null,{"children":["$L9","$La",["$","$Lb",null,{"promise":"$@c"}]]}]]}],{},null,false]},null,false]},null,false],["$","$1","h",{"children":[null,["$","$1","YsTYBeIXkXUg7M-iMa9Nb",{"children":[["$","$Ld",null,{"children":"$Le"}],null]}],null]}],false]],"m":"$undefined","G":["$f","$undefined"],"s":false,"S":true}
